radiographic_examinations.findings: Trace pleural effusion on the left, cystic changes in the gallbladder fundus suggest adenomyomatosis, a few very small stones in the gallbladder, infiltration of fat surrounding the pancreas with small ill-defined fluid pockets consistent with acute interstitial pancreatitis, no organized fluid collection, no evidence for necrosis, no focal liver lesions, no biliary dilatation, spleen normal, kidneys and adrenals unremarkable, visualized bowel unremarkable, no lymphadenopathy.
